xstart: This variable stores the initial x position of the instance when it is first created in the room. This is not a read-only variable and can be set as well as read.

{ANY_CODE} if place_meeting(x, y, obj_spike)
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}score -= 100;
{nbsp_x4}x = xstart;
{nbsp_x4}y = ystart;
{nbsp_x4}}
The above code will check for a collision with an instance of "obj_spike" and if there is one, it deducts 100 from the score and moves the instance back to its starting position.
